title: WTB: Low grade T206 Highlanders, Jersey City, and Newark
author: Tobacco&Gum

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade T206 Highlanders, Jersey City, and Newark
posts.post_content:
Just looking for these 3 teams at the moment.
I'm looking for raw cards that would grade in the 2-3 range, but will take a look at graded also.

Thank You.

Edit- Should have said, looking for raw cards that would grade 2-3 or lower.

I have a McGinnity [HoF], Newark, that's a respectable Poor [creased, but all there], $30, delivered.  You can see it on my B/S/T Tobacco Card thread, last posted 6/13.
Answer me on that thread, preferably, or email me at djdoremus@msn. com [no pm's, please] if you're interested.

Thanks.

Doug

Hi again, Jim.

Did you get my email of 6/29?
Your original email, 6/26, wound up in my Junk--This is something that has happened several times, now, with replies to emails that originated from Net54--Anyway, I've marked you as safe and future emails should go through.

I'm holding the McGinnity for you.  Money-order if fine.
Please confirm.

Thanks.

Doug
